for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, l, x) = map(int, input().split())
    z = n - l
    rr = l if l < z else z
    print(rr * x)

n = int(input())
for _ in range(n):
    (N, L, X) = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(min(L, N - L) * X)

def max_money(n, l, x):
    max_pairs = min(l, n - l)
    max_money = max_pairs * x
    return max_money
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, l, x) = map(int, input().split())
    max_money_i = max_money(n, l, x)
    print(max_money_i)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, l, x) = map(int, input().split())
    a = n - l
    if a > l:
        y = a - l
        s = n - y
        p = s / 2
        earn = int(p * x)
        print(earn)
    elif l > a:
        y = l - a
        s = n - y
        p = s / 2
        earn = int(p * x)
        print(earn)
    elif l == a:
        earn = int(l * x)
        print(earn)
